casebody.data:
Hurley KELLY, Libelant-Appellant, v. THREE BAYS CORPORATION, Ltd., Respondent-Appellee. No. 291, Docket 25844. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued April 13,1960. Decided April 15, 1960. Kenneth Heller, New York City, for libelant-appellant. Daniel J. Dougherty, New York City (Kirlin, Campbell & Keating, New York City, and Robert L. Mahar, Brooklyn, N. Y., on the brief), for respondentappellee.

Before LUMBARD, Chief Judge, and SWAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The decree of the district court is affirmed on the thorough and well reasoned opinion of Judge Bryan, reported at 1959, 173 F.Supp. 835.
